critique:
This is an executive order from 1937 exempting a US Marshal from mandatory retirement. 

Ideological Tilt: This document does not contain any overt ideological content. It is a simple exemption based on a law. Score 0.

Immigration Approach: This document has nothing to do with immigration. Score 0.

Economic Regulation: This document has no impact on economic regulation. Score 0.

Social Inclusion: This document does not address social inclusion. Score 0.
